response.overview: The film tells the story of a simple young man named Anbar. His adventures begin with a love story for the neighbor’s daughter, with whom he used to exchange letters. But one day she disappeared under mysterious circumstances without leaving any trace behind her. In order to forget her and search for a new life, Anbar leaves the neighborhood and moves to work in a building owned by Rasha. A series of events are witnessed, the heroes of which are the residents of Amara.
response.title: علاش لا ... ؟
